sqlList.sql: select ID, CHANEL_CODE AS CHANELCODE, CHANEL_NAME AS CHANELNM, CHANEL_NAME||'('||CHANEL_CODE||')' AS DISPLAYNM from T_LM_B_CHANEL

SELECT lm.ID,lm.chanel_code AS chanelcode,lm.chanel_name AS chanelnm, lm.status AS ONLINESTATUS, (CASE lm.status WHEN '0' THEN '下线' WHEN '1' THEN '上线' ELSE '' END ) as ONLINEDIS， lm.create_time AS CDTIME, lm.update_time AS UDTIME from t_lm_b_chanel lm where ((:CHANELNAME IS NULL) OR (lm.chanel_name LIKE '%'||:CHANELNAME||'%')) AND ((:ONLINESTATUS IS NULL) OR (lm.status=:ONLINESTATUS)) AND ((:StartDTime IS NULL) OR (to_date(:StartDTime, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= lm.create_time)) AND ((:EndDTime IS NULL) OR (lm.create_time <= to_date(:EndDTime, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) ORDER BY lm.ID DESC
select lm.chanel_code AS chanelcode,lm.chanel_name AS chanelnm from t_lm_b_chanel lm where (lm.chanel_code = :CHANELCODE) OR (lm.chanel_name = :CHANELNM)
select lm.chanel_code AS chanelcode,lm.chanel_name AS chanelnm from t_lm_b_chanel lm where (lm.chanel_code <> :CHANELCODE) AND (lm.chanel_name = :CHANELNM)
INSERT INTO t_lm_b_chanel(ID, chanel_code, chanel_name, status,create_time, update_time) VALUES (:ID, :CHANELCODE, :CHANELNM, '0',SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
UPDATE t_lm_b_chanel SET chanel_name=:CHANELNM, status=:ONLINESTATUS,update_time=SYSDATE WHERE chanel_code=:CHANELCODE
